metadata.title: CVE-2018-19574 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GitLab CE/EE, versions 7.6 up to 11.x before 11.3.11, 11.4 before 11.4.8,and 11.5 before 11.5.1, are vulnerable to an XSS vulnerability in the OAuthauthorization page.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
